meanings.definition: A dessert made with layers of nut meringue and whipped cream.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious dacquoise after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bakery had a variety of dacquoises on display.
meanings.sent3: The dacquoise looked so good, I almost thought it was a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as light and sweet as a dacquoise.
meanings.sent5: The dacquoise melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful taste.

meanings.definition: A type of cake or pastry made with layers of almond or hazelnut meringue and buttercream.
meanings.sent1: The dacquoise at the party was a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent2: She baked a delicious dacquoise for her friend's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The dacquoise was so tall, it almost touched the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth and comforting as a slice of dacquoise.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked dacquoise filled the room with joy.
